channel.title: Automated motion tracking?
channel.description:
I'm a noob with this stuff, so forgive me if this is obvious/well known.
Is anyone aware of anything I could use to do automated motion tracking? For example, let's say I want to pixelate a vehicle licence plate - manually moving the mask around with keyframes is a pain in the arse - but the plate is a fairly clear solid yellow block, so surely there must be something that exists that allows the editor to do this automatically?
I'd prefer if it was a solution available for Vegas.
Any help appreciated.

item.title: Automated motion tracking?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
